item.title: My library
item.description:
Below is a list of books that I have read in the past.

Computer Science

  • The C programming language - Dennis Ritchie, Brian Kernighan
  • The Go programming language - Alan Donovan, Brian Kernighan
  • Concurrency in Go - Katherine Cox
  • Let’s Go further - Alex Edwards
  • Distributed services with Go - Travis Jeffery
  • Code - Charles Petzold
  • The code book - Simon Singh
  • Inside the machine - Jon Stokes
  • Grokking algorithms - Aditya Bhargava
  • Network programming - Brian “Beej” Hall
  • Network concepts - Brian “Beej” Hall
  • Восстановление данных - Крис Касперски

Other

  • The open conspiracy - Herbert Wells
  • Why we sleep - Matthew Walker
  • How not to die - Gene Stone & Michael Greger
  • Antifragile - Nassim Nicholas Taleb
  • The blank slate - Steven Pinker
  • Siddhartha - Hermann Hesse
  • The wisdom of psychopaths - Kevin Dutton
  • Практическая характерология - Виктор Пономаренко
  • Win bigly - Scott Adams
  • Преступление и наказание - Фёдор Достоевский
  • The child in you - Stefanie Stahl
